// ================================================
// MANUAL API ROUTES â€” Typed routes for mini-fetch
// ================================================

// All entires MUST follow this structure :
// "route": {
//     method: "GET" | "POST" | "PUT" | "DELETE";
//     body?: {...};      // uniquement si POST/PUT/DELETE
//     response: {...};
// };

export interface ApiRoutes {
    // "auth/login": {
    //     method: "POST";
    //     body: { user: string; pwd: string };
    //     response: { token: string };
    // };
}

// DO NOT TOUCH OR MODIFY 
export type RoutesWithMethod<M extends ApiRoutes[keyof ApiRoutes]["method"]> = {
    [K in keyof ApiRoutes]: ApiRoutes[K]["method"] extends M ? K : never
}[keyof ApiRoutes];
